description: $BOTS is the lifeblood of the Holobots economy, and its future hangs by a thread. As the battle between the Sentinels and the Wraiths escalates, $BOTS becomes the prize that could decide everything. If the Sentinels emerge victorious, $BOTS will soar in value, restoring hope and stability. But if the Wraiths take control, their ruthless hunger for power could drive $BOTS into freefall, threatening to unravel the entire digital world.
